appStages.name: Introduction
Loyalty Email Generator
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px; font-family: \u0027Roboto\u0027, sans-serif; margin: -30px -18px 15px -18px;\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv style\u003d\"padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem; background-color: #fff; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.125); border-top-right-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px; color: #ffffff; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3 style\u003d\"color: #1E1E1E; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 20px;\"\u003eCustomer Data Upload\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px; margin-left: 40px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #023E8A; font-size: 20px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: 400;\"\u003eUpload Customer Vehicle Data\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul style\u003d\"margin-left: 10px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0;\"\u003e\r\n      \u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px; font-size: 16px; margin-left: -20px;\"\u003e\r\n        \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 5px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n        Accepts CSV files with customer information and vehicle attributes.\r\n      \u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n    \u003ch6 style\u003d\"margin-left: 0px; color: #AEAEAE;\"\u003e\r\n      Uploaded records will be processed for loyalty scoring, tier assignment and the benefits associated with the corresponding tier.\r\n    \u003c/h6\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {

      "attrs": [

          "value": ""
        }

      "content": "    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px;margin-left:20px\"\u003e\r\n\u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #023E8A; font-size: 20px;margin-bottom:15px; margin-top:10px;font-weight: 400;\"\u003eRequired Fields:\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n        \u003cul style\u003d\"margin-left: 10px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0;\"\u003e\r\n            \u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px; font-size: 16px; margin-left: -20px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; \r\n                    border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 5px; display: flex; \r\n                    align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Customer Name\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative;       "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px;margin-left:20px\"\u003e\r\n\u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #023E8A; font-size: 20px;margin-bottom:15px; margin-top:10px;font-weight: 400;\"\u003eGenerated Emails:\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n                \u003cp style\u003d\"margin-top: 10px; text-align: justify; font-size: 16px;\"\u003e\r\n                  After processing, the email will consist of the following details for each customer:\r\n                \u003c/p\u003e\r\n        \u003cul style\u003d\"margin-left: 10px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0;\"\u003e\r\n            \u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px; font-size: 16px; margin-left: -20px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; \r\n                    border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 5px; display: flex; \r\n                    align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Loyalty Points\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px; font-size: 16px; margin-left: -20px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; \r\n                    border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 5px; display: flex; \r\n                    align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Tier (Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond)\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px; font-size: 16px; margin-left: -20px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; \r\n                    border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 5px; display: flex; \r\n                    align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Benefits\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n                \u003cp style\u003d\"margin-top: 10px; text-align: justify; font-size: 16px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Each email is tailored based on the customer’s engagement and includes a call to action to visit the nearest showroom or service center.\r\n                \u003c/p\u003e\r\n                \u003c/div\u003e",
